text: Farsovsky () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Sergiyevskoye Rural Settlement of Giaginsky District, Adygea, Russia. The population of this village was 11 as of 2018. == Geography == The khutor is located on the right bank of the Fars River, in 6 km south from Sergiyevskoye, 40 km south-east from Giaginskaya and 35 km north-east from Maykop. == Ethnicity == The khutor is inhabited by Russians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Giaginsky District
title: Farsovsky
